title: Lot of 9 B18's with Daubert and Wagner
author: Wildfireschulte

posts.post_title: Lot of 9 B18's with Daubert and Wagner
posts.post_content: For sale this lot of 9 B18's includes Foster, Wiltse, Connolly, O. Miller, Bassler, Daubert, Wagner, Cole and Shanks. Good looking group of blankets for $100 shipped (pp gift or MO preferred).
